1:
All you people who serve Yahweh,
\q2 who stand up and serve him at night in his temple,
\q1 come and praise him!
\q1
2:
Lift up your hands to pray to him in the temple
\q2 and praise him!
\b
\q1
3:
I hope that Yahweh, who created heaven and the earth,
\q2 may bless you from where he lives in the temple on Mount Zion!
134:
\d A psalm written for people going up to the temple to worship.
\b
\q1
